title: Show price paid on IAP report
body: I often fiddle with the price of the In-App Purchase(IAP) in my WP app, to try and find the most profitable compromise between price and #of purchases. At present I have to manually record when I change the price, as there appears to be no way to track this in the dev portal, which seems strange given all the other info that is provided in the exported Excel file.

comments.body:
Excellent idea! A must have!
You could also implement via analytics ofc.
